doc:
Rafaela Aparicio https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rafaela_Aparicio 0 Rafaela Díaz Valiente MML (9 April 1906 – 9 June 1996) better known as Rafaela Aparicio was a famous Spanish film and theatre actress. She made more than 100 films. The most remembered are Carlos Saura's Anna and the Wolves, Mama Turns 100 and Fernando Fernán Gómez's El extraño viaje. She died of a stroke in Madrid in a retirement home. Rafaela_Díaz_Valiente_MML ( 9_April_1906 – 9_June_1996 ) better_known as Rafaela_Aparicio was a_famous_Spanish_film_and_theatre_actress . She made more_than_100_films . The_most_remembered_are Carlos_Saura 's_Anna and the_Wolves , Mama Turns 100 and Fernando_Fernán_Gómez 's_El_extraño_viaje . She died of a_stroke in Madrid in a_retirement_home .
